00020    /*
00021    * Constructor.
00022    */
00023    DiagnosticManager::DiagnosticManager()
00024    : Manager<Diagnostic>()
00025    {}

00028    * Destructor.

00030    DiagnosticManager::~DiagnosticManager()

00033    /*
00034    * Read parameter file. 
00035    *
00036    * \param in input parameter file stream.
00037    */
00038    void DiagnosticManager::readParam(std::istream &in)
00039    {
00040       readBegin(in, "DiagnosticManager");
00041       read<long>(in,"baseInterval", Diagnostic::baseInterval);
00042       Manager<Diagnostic>::readParam(in);
00043    }
00044 
00045    /*
00046    * Call initialize method of each diagnostic.
00047    */
00048    void DiagnosticManager::setup() 
00049    {
00050       for (int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
00051          (*this)[i].setup();
00052       }
00053    }
00054  
00055    /*
00056    * Call sample method of each diagnostic.
00057    */
00058    void DiagnosticManager::sample(long iStep) 
00059    {
00060       if (iStep % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) { 
00061          for (int i=0; i < size(); ++i) {
00062             (*this)[i].sample(iStep);
00063          }
00064       }
00065    }
00066  
00067    /*
00068    * Call output method of each diagnostic.
00069    */
00070    void DiagnosticManager::output() 
00071    {
00072       for (int i=0; i < size(); ++i) {
00073          (*this)[i].output();
00074       }
00075    }
00076 
00077    /*
00078    * Save state to binary file archive.
00079    */
00080    void DiagnosticManager::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00081    {
00082       for (int i=0; i < size(); ++i) {
00083          (*this)[i].save(ar);
00084       }
00085    }
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00089    */
00090    void DiagnosticManager::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00091    {
00092       for (int i=0; i < size(); ++i) {
00093          (*this)[i].load(ar);
00094       }
00095    }
00096 
00097 }
